meanings.definition: Relating to the electrical activity in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The bioelectric signals in the body help control muscle movements.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study bioelectric phenomena to understand how the nervous system functions.
meanings.sent3: The bioelectric dance of neurons is like a symphony of electricity in the brain.
meanings.sent4: Her bioelectric aura seemed to light up the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: The bioelectric impulses in the heart keep it beating rhythmically.

meanings.definition: Producing or involving electricity in biological systems.
meanings.sent1: Bioelectric eels can generate powerful shocks to defend themselves.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring bioelectric technologies for medical treatments.
meanings.sent3: The bioelectric frog seemed to have a shocking personality.
meanings.sent4: The bioelectric storm in the sky lit up the night with flashes of light.
meanings.sent5: The bioelectric field around the plant seemed to attract insects for pollination.
